parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Ineffective seat belt retractors can fail to restrain occupants in the event of an accident, leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Seat belts do not lock when pulled with a jerk
seat belts do not retract properly
seat belt retractors do not return to their original position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Faulty seat belt buckles can cause the belt to unfasten, leaving occupants unrestrained in the event of an accident, leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Seat belt buckle unfastens
seat belt buckle cracked
seat belt buckle failed to engage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Door-mounted seat belts can fail to restrain occupants in the event of an accident, leading to injuries or fatalities, especially if the doors open on impact.
symptoms: Seat belt base is attached to the door
seat belt can be dragged out of the vehicle in an accident
door-mounted seat belts fray when released from retractor housing.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure to Repair Recalled Seat Belts
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to repair recalled seat belts can lead to ineffective restraints in the event of an accident, resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Recall repairs refused
recall repairs not completed due to lack of parts
incorrect repair of recalled seat belts.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Seat belt failure in accidents can lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Seat belt failed to restrain driver or passenger in an accident
seat belt caused injury in an accident.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Hybrid Design Flaw: Engine and Transmission Vibration
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The hybrid design flaw can cause the vehicle to vibrate dangerously, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel jumps up and down
the vehicle vibrates excessively
and the engine and transmission mounts are difficult to replace due to unclear factory manual instructions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ball joints can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents, injuries, and damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The ball joints break off
the wheel falls off while driving
and the vehicle becomes unstable.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The steering and suspension issues can cause the vehicle to become unstable, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries.
symptoms: The front tire makes a grinding noise during slow left turns
the vehicle is not stable while driving
and the control arm assembly and ball joints need to be replaced frequently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine overheating can cause serious damage to the engine, leading to costly repairs, and in some cases, even engine failure or fires, which can be a safety risk to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The temperature gauge is in the red zone
the vehicle overheats when idling or in traffic
the engine revs very hard
the vehicle leaks coolant
the vehicle catches on fire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine oil leaks can cause damage to the engine and other components, leading to costly repairs, and in some cases, even engine failure.
symptoms: The engine is leaking oil
the oil level is low
the vehicle is smoking
the engine is making a loud noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Exhaust system failure can cause the vehicle to emit harmful gases, such as carbon monoxide, which can be a safety risk to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The vehicle is emitting a loud noise
the exhaust system is damaged
the muffler is rusted out
the gas tank is smashed in.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission problems can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to drive, which can be a safety risk to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The gear will not engage
the clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.
